normal.1: Performs up to 4 consecutive claymore strikes.

charged.1: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to perform an especially powerful Severing Splendor strike toward the front.

plunging.1: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

description.0: Calling upon her authority over "conflict," Mavuika summons the All-Fire Armaments passed down through the line of human Archons, dealing Nightsoul-aligned <pyro>Pyro DMG</pyro>.
description.2: After using this, Mavuika's Nightsoul points are restored to max value, and she enters the Nightsoul's Blessing state.
description.5: Has different forms when Tapped or Held.
description.8: "Divine Name Unleashed": The All-Fire Armaments manifest as Rings of Searing Radiance. The Rings follow the current active character and attack nearby opponents at intervals, dealing Nightsoul-aligned <pyro>Pyro DMG</pyro>.
description.11: "Ancient Name Unbound": The All-Fire Armaments manifest as a Flamestrider. In this state, Mavuika can ride the Flamestrider at high speed, or activate its hidden backup propulsion module to temporarily cross various terrain types and glide in mid-air temporarily. Mavuika's Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks will also be converted to deal Nightsoul-aligned <pyro>Pyro DMG</pyro>, which cannot be overridden. When sprinting, she also deals Nightsoul-aligned <pyro>Pyro DMG</pyro> to opponents along her path.
description.13: While in the Nightsoul's Blessing state, Tapping the Elemental Skill can switch the All-Fire Armaments' form. The Armaments will disappear once Mavuika's Nightsoul's Blessing state ends.
description.15: Continuously consumes Nightsoul points according to the All-Fire Armaments' form. Mavuika's Nightsoul's Blessing state ends once Nightsoul points are exhausted.
description.17: If you told Mavuika that vehicles like the Flamestrider require license plates for identification in another world, that would make her happy too:
description.19: "See, mine's the only one that exists here. So, I get to pick my plate number, right?"

skillParams.2: Rings of Searing Radiance Attack Interval

description.0: Let the inner voices of the people reach the divine throne in the heavens.
description.1: Mavuika's Elemental Burst is not reliant on Energy, but instead, on "Fighting Spirit".
description.4: When Mavuika has at least 50% Fighting Spirit, she can consume it all to unleash her Elemental Burst.
description.5: Mavuika can obtain Fighting Spirit via the following methods:
6: When in combat, Nightsoul points consumed by nearby party members are converted to Fighting Spirit.
When nearby party members' Normal Attacks hit opponents, Mavuika gains 1.5 Fighting Spirit. This can trigger once every 0.1s.
description.8: After using this, Mavuika gains 10 Nightsoul points and enters the Nightsoul's Blessing state. Riding her Flamestrider high in the air, she uses a powerful Sunfell Slice against opponents on the ground, dealing Nightsoul-aligned AoE Pyro DMG and entering the "Crucible of Death and Life" state.
description.10: During this time, Mavuika's various actions will no longer consume Nightsoul points, and her interruption resistance is increased. Also, the DMG dealt by Sunfell Slice and the Flamestrider form's Normal and Charged Attacks is increased based on the amount of Fighting Spirit she has when using the Elemental Burst.
description.11: The Crucible of Death and Life will be canceled when Mavuika leaves the field.
description.13: "â€”But this time, I shall shatter this destiny with my own hands."

description.0: When a nearby party member triggers a Nightsoul Burst, Mavuika's ATK increases by 35% for 10s.

After using her Elemental Burst, Hour of Burning Skies, every point of Fighting Spirit present when it is used increases the DMG that the current active character deals by 0.25%. The maximum increase obtainable this way is 50%, and this effect lasts 20s. The increase will decay over 20s until it reaches 0.
After Nightsoul points have been fully depleted, Mavuika will switch to using Phlogiston to maintain the All-Fire Armaments' Flamestrider form.
description.1: While in an area with Phlogiston Mechanics within Natlan, Nightsoul Transmission: Mavuika, can be used. When the current active character is sprinting, climbing, swimming, in movement modes caused by certain Talents, or at a certain height in the air, switching to Mavuika will trigger the following: Mavuika enters the Nightsoul's Blessing state and obtains 50% of her maximum Nightsoul points. Nightsoul Transmission can be triggered once every 10s by your own party.

description.0: The party's Nightsoul Transmission CD is decreased by 20%.
Mavuika's maximum Nightsoul points are increased to 120, and she gains Fighting Spirit 25% more efficiently.
description.1: Additionally, she gains 40% ATK for 8s after gaining Fighting Spirit.

description.0: When in the Nightsoul's Blessing State, Mavuika's Base ATK is increased by 300, and she obtains the following effects based on All-Fire Armaments' form:
1: Rings of Searing Radiance: Nearby opponents' DEF decreased by 20%.
Each point of Mavuika's ATK increases her Normal Attack DMG by 1, and her Charged Attack DMG by 1.5.

description.0: Increases the Level of Hour of Burning Skies by 3.
Enhances the effects of the Passive Talent "Kiongozi":
description.1: The DMG increase gained after using the Elemental Burst Hour of Burning Skies will not decay over time.
description.2: You must first unlock the Passive Talent "Kiongozi".

description.0: Increases the Level of The Named Moment by 3.
The All-Fire Armaments from the Elemental Skill The Named Moment receive all-around improvements:
1: Rings of Searing Radiance: When the Rings' attacks hit opponents, a Flamestrider will crash into the struck opponent, dealing 200% of ATK as Nightsoul-aligned <pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</pyro>.

Flamestrider: When Mavuika is riding the Flamestrider, Rings of Searing Radiance will also follow her, dealing 400% of ATK as Nightsoul-aligned <pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</pyro> to nearby opponents once every 3s.
description.3: Additionally, the terrain-crossing abilities of the Flamestrider form will be further improved, and when not in combat, when Mavuika's Nightsoul points drop to 5, she will gain an additional 80 points. This effect can trigger once every 15s.
